name: Aviva Holdings Limited
description: Operator of an artificial intelligence-powered digital bank intended to provide credit. The company combines artificial intelligence and video technology by building a bridge to those living in remote communities with its physical onboarding kiosks to reduce costs and offer affordable interest rates, enabling customers with loans and credits as per their needs.
